title: Stack Fall 3D: Crazy Mode
description: New adventure begins. More crazy challenges are waiting for you! New adventure begins. More crazy challenges are waiting for you!

title: Sniper Wolf Hunter
description: Wild Hunting is the dream of every sniper hunter. Wolf Hunter 2020 lets you hunt the biggest and most dangerous animals in the world. You will rely on your marksman shooting sniper skills to kill and trap animals including Zebras, Cheetahs, Elephants, Lions and even dinosaurs. Moreover, chasing your target animals on a moving truck makes this offline game even more challenging. Do you have what it takes to become a sniper hunting legend?
instructions: Please use mouse to control the gun and use keyboard arrows to control the player

title: Chubby Runner
description: Chubby Runner is jump runner game where chubby kids need to jump over coming vehicles, to collect coins and sandwiches to get extra points and energy. Watch on other obstacles who is on the road.
instructions: Tap on screen to jump.

title: Jet Sky Water Boat Racing Game
description: Are you looking for jet ski games or boat racing games for the best jet ski racing experience in the era of boat games and jetski games? To play the water racing games or jet ski games is always a great source of fun for the jet ski racer. Enjoy free water games along with thrill jet ski race with opponents in this water boat racing simulator. Rush your jet ski in the 3D realistic environment of forest, desert & snowy tracks.
instructions: Please use keyboard arrows

title: Fox Coloring Book
description: Fox Coloring Book is fun online game that your kid will love. Kids love fun coloring games, and this Fox Coloring Game is one of the best free coloring book for children! Coloring Games is filled with fun, colorful, and creative drawing and painting tools that help kids of all ages enjoy creating art on your mobile device or browser.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Basketball Shot
description: shoot the basket
instructions: use touch to shoot the ball

title: Buggy Race Obstacle
description: This is a simple racing game in which you control a buggy on a beach track and have to go as far as you can. But you must avoid other buggy cars and obstacles along the track and if you hit one, you will lose one heart. If you lose all 4 hearts, you will lose the game! Your score is based on how far you have proceeded, so do your best and stay on the track as long as you can!
instructions: W - UP S - DOWN

title: Offroad Racing 2D
description: Offroad Racing 2D is a fun racing game with multiple cars and levels.

description: The wonderful pony land has many beautiful ponies, Let's color them and make them happy. Have a great fun!

title: Happy Family Coloring Book
description: Happy Family Coloring Book is coloring game with images of happy family. Choose image that you want to color ans start coloring as you wish. You can save colored image in your pc. Use your mouse to color. Choose your favorite colors and enjoy in this game.
instructions: Use mouse to play this game.

title: Bubble Shooter Fruits Candies
description: "Bubble Shooter Fruits Candies" is a classic bubble shooter game enhanced with a variety of new items and power-ups. Your objective is to aim and release the Fruit Candy to create combinations with other similar Candies. Utilize power-ups strategically to conquer the challenges and advance through the levels. Can you master the art of bubble shooting in this fruity and candy-filled adventure?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Crazy Bicycle
description: Crazy Bicycler is a free mobile game available . Join Millions of game players who love to simulate bike games and want to become pro bike riders. Real bike stunt championship in your smart phone is just about to start; you are just a single tap away. Now the bike stunt game is available with upgraded tricky bikes and crazy riders
instructions: Best chance to be the tricks master by applying stunts in racing 3d game. Only the best mobile game users are invited to perform unique stunts. Put the helmet, start your motorcycle and be the part of this bike race game adventure. Keep in Mind < Helmet is a vital parameter to decide your winning in motor bike stunts, and this will prove at the end of game :-) > Moto games adventure is now on your ﬁnger tips. Tutorial will help you to simulate bike driving.

title: Shooting Blocky Combat Swat GunGame Survival
description: Shooting Block Combat Swat GunGame Survival Multiplayer in the awesome map arena fun, ready to play 5 game modes ? Play with friends around the world, you can play offline up to 40 levels. You can play with 18 guns by adding camo and attachments Have Fun!
instructions: WASD - move Mouse - shooting, aim, look around, change gun SPACE - jump TAB - menu SHIFT - run Q- change camo E- change attachment

title: Heavy Cargo Truck Driver
description: Get ready for the realistic and exciting offroad cargo truck driving experience. Drive offroad cargo truck to explore hilly environment and test your mountain cargo truck driving games skills.

title: King of Spider Solitaire
description: The classic spider solitaire with multiple difficulty levels.
instructions: Create royal flushes by suit, stack cards from King to Ace to clear them from the playing field.

title: Princess Candy
description: Princess Candy is a wildly addictive match-two puzzle game!
instructions: How to play: 1. Tap on two or more same candy to make them burst. 2. Scoring the target points to level up. 3. Don't rush! no time limit!

title: PillowBattle.io
description: Are you bored staying home? Grab that pillow and arrange a real social distancing. Get to the pillow first, test your accuracy and skills, dodge enemy attacks! Wait for enemy to beat each other or take the initiative and help them lose. Last one standing wins this io game.
instructions: Follow the in-game instructions.

title: Princesses Rock Ballerinas
description: This game combines two borderline styles. On the one hand, it is a classical ballet style that is interesting for high society, and on the other hand, rock and metal, which is often seen as intimidating and inaccessible. By combining these two extremes, we get a unique style that is interesting to young people...
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Tow Trucks Coloring
description: Tow Trucks Coloring is puzzle coloring game where you need to color towing trucks as you wish. Choose truck that you want to color and enjoy coloring. You can learn colors and towing trucks while play this game.
instructions: Use mouse to color.

title: Cars Paint 3D
description: CARS PAINT 3D is fun addictive hyper casual game.Think logically and complete the Levels.
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: Princess High Fashion Red Carpet Show
description: The princesses were invited to a High Fashion Show. Although the princesses are very fashionable people, they still worry that their clothes are too ordinary. So, these girls met to go to the High Fashion Clothes Shop to choose clothes and accessories. Can you help them choose good-looking and fashionable clothes? On the day of your participation in the High Fashion Show, you have to help girls make beautiful hairstyles. Can you complete this task?
instructions: The princesses were invited to a High Fashion Show. Although the princesses are very fashionable people, they still worry that their clothes are too ordinary. So, these girls met to go to the High Fashion Clothes Shop to choose clothes and accessories. Can you help them choose good-looking and fashionable clothes? On the day of your participation in the High Fashion Show, you have to help girls make beautiful hairstyles. Can you complete this task?

title: Football Flick
description: Are you ready for football? In this great game chose one of 12 football stars and play one on one. Bit them all.

title: Big Farm Match 3
description: In "Big Farm Match 3," your task is to swap blocks to create groups of 3 or more identical crops, such as fruits and vegetables, either horizontally or vertically. Continue matching until you've harvested the required number of crop units. Each level presents different crops that you must harvest to progress. Can you become the ultimate farmer and successfully harvest all the crops in this delightful match-3 game?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to swap blocks.

title: Penguin Jigsaw
description: Penguin Jigsaw is a free online game from genre of puzzle and jigsaw games. In this game you have a total of 6 jigsaw puzzles. You need to start from the first one and to unlock the next image. You have three modes for each picture: Easy with 25 pieces, Medium with 49 pieces and Hard with 100 pieces.
instructions: Use mouse or tap to screen.

title: Patterns Link
description: Link together all of these classic patterns in this unique match 3 puzzle game! Try to connect all patterns as fast as possible until all the tiles are gone!
instructions: Click on the same tiles.

title: Mahjong Link
description: In Mahjong Link you must match two identical Mahjong blocks. A block has to be free on at least one side. It's a very relaxing and simple game to play. Each mahjong tile in this link game is numbered to identify the tiles more easily.
instructions: Click on two same tiles.

title: Learn to Draw Glow Cartoon
description: We have an easy drawing tutorial for everyone. Learn how to draw cartoons and anime step by step. For you to learn drawing and glow coloring. Don’t need any skill, no age limit.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Pixie Twins Birth
description: Pixie is having twins! Play one of the most fun games ever and find out how to take care of two fairy babies. Call 911 first and make sure Pixie gets to the hospital in time. Take care of her needs while waiting for the ambulance, water, oxygen and cuddles are a must! After that you can go to the nursery room and visit the new mommy.
instructions: Tap to play this game.

title: Drifty Race
description: Here is a car stunt racing arcade game that is made of 3D game engine. You have a chance to concentrate on the timing of drifting rather than speeding up which is actually automatic. Why not entertain with this game for relax?
instructions: Tapping to turn at each curve

title: Princess Animal Style Fashion Party
description: Today is the weekend. Our cute girls plan to have a fashion party. Elsa likes Neko style, Anna likes leopard print and Ariel prefers peacock dress. Let’s help them choose their favorite animal outfits and match a nice makeup. The party is about to begin, let's act!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Jumpy Tile
description: Control tile and try to pass thru obstacles and other tiles. Move around them. Press on left or right mouse or arrow key to control the tile.
instructions: Tap on screen to play

title: Baby Taylor Daily Life In Kindergarten
description: Baby Taylor needs to go to the kindergarten every day. Have you ever been curious about a kid’s daily life in the kindergarten? They always take a school bus to go there and learn some preschool knowledge from a teacher. They also play games together. Have a good day with Taylor to enjoy in the kindergarten.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Sky Train Simulator : Elevated Train Driving Game
description: Witness new generation of rails on sky tracks while driving futuristic bullet trains of 2020. Play Elevated Train Driving Simulator 3D game and drive sky train above road traffic jams in massive city environment. Transport city passengers from one train station to other subway stations in sky train.

title: BFF Summer Bash 2020
description: Cool! The summer starts now! The BFF Mia and Bella are planning the summer bash 2020. Let's join them and make them wear amazing makeup and cool outfits for the party. Have a great Bash!

title: Shoot the Duck
description: Your hunting dog whines in impatience, because the duck hunting season is coming. He can not wait to bring you a booty, which you cleverly shoot. To complete the round in Shoot the Duck, you must hit the maximum number of flying targets. Their number is located on the bottom horizontal panel.
instructions: Move - W,A,S,D or Arrow keys, Shoot – Spacebar or tap on your screen!

title: Cooking In The Kitchen
description: Choose a recipe and select how you want to make it! Pick a good great pizza or become the hamburger chef. You as a Junior Chef must take control over the kitchen at home, prepare your self to become a restaurant owner or buy your own Food Truck after learning to cook. Prepare dinner and practice to cook faster and better each time as Jr Chef! Create a cuisine cooking fever with professional food like a real master in the kitchen! This game is specially built for kids.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Funny Rescue Gardener
description: Samantha is a great gardener, but even the best will get accidents sometimes. Let's play and rescue Samantha from the horrible accident! Help her recover from the wounds and have fun!
instructions: Use MOUSE to choose tools and help her.

title: Modern Commando Combat
description: Get ready & play as an fps shooter hero to kill your enemy like the gangster and terrorist commando in this world war Modern Commando Combat . Display your expert fps shooting skills to kill all enemies on the battlefield. Show your expert shooting skills and arrive into the enemy vile without any terror. How to play: Use WASD or arrow keys -> Player movement M Key -> show/Hide Map Left Mouse -> Fire X Key -> Crouch R Key -> Reload Gun
instructions: Use WASD or arrow keys -> Player movement M Key -> show/Hide Map Left Mouse -> Fire X Key -> Crouch R Key -> Reload Gun

Have real backup of fire shooting games and battle

description: Drive a wrecking ball truck and pass all obstacles. Use the wrecking ball to destroy various constructions standing in your way.
